channel.title: INsmh
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INsmh, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Boy, 3, savaged by rampaging panther in front of terrified onlookers at circus

item.title: Long lost Mayan city rediscovered by accident in Mexican jungle – what it looked like
item.description: Three sites around the size of the Scottish capital, Edinburgh, were discovered 'by accident' - after one archaeologist browsed through some data on t...

item.title: Serial paedophile had chilling five-word message for police when his vile crimes were uncovered
item.description: Peter Long was convicted of abusing four girls as young as seven but is suspected of attacking 30 more over four decades. He called the police saying ...

item.title: 'I almost died giving birth after developing flesh-eating bug during C-section'

item.title: Woman finds strange metal rod baked into her Pizza Hut takeaway
item.description: The fast food giant refused to give her a refund.

item.title: Mystery footprints appear at coffee shop ‘haunted by soldier from 1800s’
item.description: 'Within the first week of the shop, I kept hearing the sound of rustling noises in the office.'

item.title: 'I'm a real-life witch and people should be afraid of my powerful revenge spell'
item.description: One self-professed witch has revealed the powerful spells she uses to keep negative energies away from her - and to 'punish' anyone who crosses her
